description: This file implements an authentication service for a Flutter frontend, providing methods for login, registration, JWT token storage, and retrieval, as well as checking authentication status and logout functionality.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A class that manages user authentication, including login, registration, JWT token storage, and checking authentication status.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts user login with API, and stores JWT token on success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Attempts user registration and returns success status.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if a user is currently authenticated by verifying the presence of a stored JWT token.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes the stored JWT token, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: getAuthHeader
methods.description: Returns headers containing the Authorization with Bearer token for authenticated API requests.
